titleStmt.title: Fayre warning, or, Happy is he whom other mens harmes can make to beware, and to shun Satans charmes To the tune of Packingtons pound.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

notesStmt.note: Signed: M. P., i.e. Martin Parker.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Verse - "The world is orerun with enormous abuse,".
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
